item.description:
The Help

2011PG-13

146 minutes

In1960s Jackson, Miss., aspiring writer Eugenia Phelan crosses taboo racial lines by conversing with Aibileen Clark about her life as a housekeeper, and their ensuing friendship upsets the fragile dynamic between the haves and the have-nots. When other long-silent black servants begin opening up to Eugenia, the disapproving conservative Southern town soon gets swept up in the turbulence of changing times.

Cast:Emma Stone, Viola Davis, Bryce Dallas Howard, Octavia Spencer, Jessica Chastain, Ahna O'Reilly, Allison Janney, Anna Camp, Cicely Tyson, Mike Vogel, Sissy SpacekDirector:Tate TaylorGenres:Drama, Social Issue Dramas, Dramas Based on Contemporary Literature, 20th Century Period Pieces, Dramas Based on the Book, Period Pieces, Blu-rayThis movie is:Emotional, HeartfeltFormat:DVD and Blu-ray

Â 

Vegetarian dinner at 7, movie at 8

Discussion of personality types by Enneagram expert, Herb Pearce, therapist, author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living.

www.herbpearce.com, 781 648 3737, herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Enneagram at the Movies & Dinner - The Help
